message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $180.
Thanks for the offer, Alice! I'm interested, but $180 is a bit steep for me. Would you consider $120?
I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob, but I've got to make a profit on this one. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'll sell it to you for $160.
I appreciate you coming down on the price, Alice.  How about $140?  That's a fair deal for both of us.
I'm getting close to my minimum price, Bob, but I think we can meet somewhere in the middle. I'll sell it to you for $155.
